name: Rock Beach
description: Rock beach is one of the most prominent beach in Pondy. Unlike traditional beaches this is filled with rocks where you can get an amazing sunrise and sunset view. This beach is located just opposite to white town. And you can evidently find lot of hotels and cafe. Best thing about this beach is, itâ€™s off limits from traffic. You can find crafts shop and market place around. One beach for a perfect evening.
